alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Greene; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 3:57PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Greene, Craighead and northeastern Poinsett Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 357 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Egypt to Jonesboro to near Trumann. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Paragould, Trumann, Bono, Lake City, Bay, Brookland, Monette, Crowleys Ridge State Park, Lake Frierson State Park, Cash, Egypt, Walcott, Fontaine, Greenfield, Black Oak, Apt, Valley View, Gum Point and Farrville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
